title: d0ke
author: d0ke
created_time: March 05, 2023, 01:13:21 PMLast edit: April 05, 2023, 04:49:53 PM by d0ke
content: Upd 05mar2023Telegram bot now support making inscriptions. Easy as attaching file with caption /make.Once inscription was made - it's on your balance (use /balance to see) and you can use command /send to send it to your wallet.If you attach picture - bot will compress it (best compression algo in the market right now - very little artefacts and super low file size) so you pay much much less.-----Original post ------We made bot to explore inscriptions in Discord and Telegram. It supports /insc and /rnd commands. You can invite it to your server/group/channel to have fun with your buddies.Discord bot:https://discord.gg/inscriptionsagorahttps://discord.gg/Nz4gqcxwqm Telegram bot:bot https://t.me/inscriptionsagorabotchat group https://t.me/inscriptionsagorastream channel https://t.me/inscriptionsagorastreamBot tutorial videohttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dyzfyDAEQeY&ab_channel=InscriptionsAgoraWhat features you would love to see these bots can do?

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Hi. You started this thread in the wrong section. This is a Bitcoin discussion sub-board. You can move your board to the project development board. I believe that will be more appropriate for your thread. I don't know what is the feature of your bot since I do not understand what it is all about. I hope I will manage my spare time to look at your video and see what it's all about.

comments.author: mendace
comments.body: Quote from: d0ke on March 05, 2023, 01:13:21 PMHi everyone! I want to take some feedback on the subject.Telegram bot:bot https://t.me/inscriptionsagorabotNice idea and I'd also be willing to add the bot to my group but have you thought about how to get it posted in the right topic if the Telegram group has been transformed into a forum with the new function?

comments.author: d0ke
comments.body: Quote from: John Abraham on March 05, 2023, 01:22:49 PMHi. You started this thread in the wrong section. This is a Bitcoin discussion sub-board. You can move your board to the project development board. I believe that will be more appropriate for your thread. I don't know what is the feature of your bot since I do not understand what it is all about. I hope I will manage my spare time to look at your video and see what it's all about. Oh, ok, I thought it was deleted!) Thanks for the management!

comments.author: d0ke
comments.body: Quote from: mendace on March 05, 2023, 02:01:27 PMQuote from: d0ke on March 05, 2023, 01:13:21 PMHi everyone! I want to take some feedback on the subject.Telegram bot:bot https://t.me/inscriptionsagorabotNice idea and I'd also be willing to add the bot to my group but have you thought about how to get it posted in the right topic if the Telegram group has been transformed into a forum with the new function?TY! I just tested - you can use /insc and /rnd commands in threads in trasformed groups. The bot will replay to your message accordinly. Have fun! Please don't hesitate to leave a feedback of what functionality you'd find nice to use.

comments.author: mendace
comments.body: Quote from: d0ke on March 05, 2023, 04:44:38 PMTY! I just tested - you can use /insc and /rnd commands in threads in trasformed groups. The bot will replay to your message accordinly. Have fun! Please don't hesitate to leave a feedback of what functionality you'd find nice to use.But is it possible to have it automatically posted with each addition of inscriptions in the blocks?Â  without giving any command?

comments.author: d0ke
comments.body: No, we need to figure out if it's possible to do that the way telegram don't ban us (because it would look like huge spam traffic). We will announce new features on youtube, telegram and discord channels, so stay tuned.

comments.author: d0ke
comments.created_time: April 05, 2023, 05:08:20 PMLast edit: April 05, 2023, 08:08:16 PM by d0ke
comments.body: Now Telegram bot can make iscriptions for you at very best price with very good compession algo for images. It also accept big images which usually are not accepted by inscription services.Making inscription now is as easy as attaching file with caption /make https://i.ibb.co/bd3LNmG/2023-04-05-195947.jpgAfter inscription is made it will be on your /balance and if you wish you can /send it to your wallet any time.Price comparison (equal fee rate):https://i.ibb.co/Lz1f1Q5/2023-04-05-195806.png
